CustomField.formula: IF( RecordTypeId = '012360000019AuP', Name & " - "& SIP_Corp_UCS_ID__c , IF( CONTAINS('012360000019AuO:012360000019AuN', RecordTypeId), Name & " - " & SIP_ARC_Number__c, IF(RecordTypeId = '012360000012Go5', Name & " - " & SIP_HOL_IATA_Number_For_Reserved_Account__c, '')))
CustomField.label: Account Name & ID
